athena:
Muon slice B->Jpsi->mumu sample, run2 chains MuonSlice, B->Jpsi->mumu, run2 chains EventMax=-1;runMergedChain=True TrigInDetValidation_RTT_topOptions_MuonSlice Trigger/TrigValidation/TrigInDetValidation TrigInDetValidation long # include "samples/TrigInDetValidation_mu_sample1.xml"
RttLibraryTools ExeRunner
exeName TIDArdict.exe
exeParamString TIDAdata11-rtt.dat -f data-muon-bphys-merge.root -p 13 -b Test_bin.dat
RttLibraryTools ExeRunner
exeName TIDAcomparitor.exe
exeParamString data-muon-bphys-merge.root data-mu_bphys-reference.root HLT_mu6_idperf_InDetTrigTrackingxAODCnv_Muon_FTF HLT_mu6_L2Star_idperf_TrigL2SiTrackFinder_Muon_1 HLT_mu6_L2Star_idperf_TrigL2SiTrackFinder_Muon_2 -d HLTL2-plots
RttLibraryTools ExeRunner
exeName TIDAcomparitor.exe
exeParamString data-muon-bphys-merge.root data-mu_bphys-reference.root HLT_mu6_idperf_InDetTrigTrackingxAODCnv_Muon_FTF HLT_mu6_idperf_InDetTrigTrackingxAODCnv_Muon_EFID HLT_mu6_L2Star_idperf_InDetTrigTrackingxAODCnv_Muon_EFID -d HLTEF-plots
# include "TrigInDetValidation_expertMonitoring.xml" # include "TrigInDetValidation_costMonitoring.xml"
RTT:Top CheckFileRunner0
data-mu_bphys-reference.root expert-monitoring-mu_bphys-ref.root # include "TrigInDetValidation_aux.xml"
